inlineContent.text: Get up and running in a few minutes with our drop-in turn-by-turn navigation
, or build a completely custom turn-by-turn navigation app with our core components for routing and navigation

abstract.text: The Navigation UIKit framework provides the ready-to-use drop-in turn-by-turn navigation UI.

A banner protocol provides the ability to show content inside
. Components that conform to
protocol must be instances of the
. Banners are injected into
and can have various properties: can be shown at the top or at the bottom of the screen, can be expanded and

A view that displays the current maneuver instruction as a “card” resembling a user notification.
A subsequent maneuver is always partially visible on one side of the view.
